languages.text: "Аребенниан не стал бы лгать о подобном! Да и разве не слышал{mf||а} ты слов умирающего провидца?" {n}Нетерпение тлеет в изумрудных глазах эльдарки.{/n} "Надеюсь, сомнения твоей души успеют развеяться прежде, чем мы достигнем шпиля. Ибо я прошу откликнуться не на слова Ноктюрна, но на мою просьбу, элантах".

traits.locale_text: "Аребенниан не стал бы лгать о подобном! Да и разве не слышал{mf||а} ты слов умирающего провидца?" {n}Нетерпение тлеет в изумрудных глазах эльдарки.{/n} "Надеюсь, сомнения твоей души успеют развеяться прежде, чем мы достигнем шпиля. Ибо я прошу откликнуться не на слова Ноктюрна, но на мою просьбу, элантах".

languages.text: "An Arebennian would not lie about this! Or did you not hear the words of the dying Farseer?" {n}Impatience burns in Yrliet's emerald eyes.{/n} "I hope your soul's doubts will be dispelled before we reach the spire. I am not asking you to rise to Nocturne's words, but to my request."
languages.original_text: "Аребенниан не стал бы лгать о подобном! Да и разве не слышал{mf||а} ты слов умирающего провидца?" {n}Нетерпение тлеет в изумрудных глазах эльдарки.{/n} "Надеюсь, сомнения твоей души успеют развеяться прежде, чем мы достигнем шпиля. Ибо я прошу откликнуться не на слова Ноктюрна, но на мою просьбу, элантах".

Or did you not hear the words of the dying Farseer?" {n}Impatience burns in Yrliet's emerald eyes.{/n} "I hope your soul's doubts will be dispelled before we reach the spire. I am not asking you to rise to Nocturne's words, but to my request."

"An Arebennian would not lie about this! Or did you not hear the words of the dying Farseer?" {n}Impatience burns in Yrliet's emerald eyes.{/n} "I hope your soul's doubts will be dispelled before we reach the spire. I am not asking you to rise to Nocturne's words, but to my request."

"An Arebennian would not lie about this! Or did you not hear the words of the dying Farseer?" {n}Impatience burns in Yrliet's emerald eyes.{/n} "I hope your soul's doubts will be dispelled before we reach the spire. I am not asking you to rise to Nocturne's words, but to my request."

"An Arebennian would not lie about this! Or did you not hear the words of the dying Farseer?" {n}Impatience burns in Yrliet's emerald eyes.{/n} "I hope your soul's doubts will be dispelled before we reach the spire. I am not asking you to rise to Nocturne's words, but to my request."

languages.text: “在这种问题上，独角是不会撒谎的！而且，难道你没听到那个垂死的先知说了什么吗？”{n}伊莉耶特绿宝石般的眼中充满了渴切。{/n}“我希望我们到达尖塔之前，你灵魂中的疑虑会消散。我并不是请求你听从那个丑角的话语，而是请求你聆听我的请求。”
languages.original_text: "An Arebennian would not lie about this! Or did you not hear the words of the dying Farseer?" {n}Impatience burns in Yrliet's emerald eyes.{/n} "I hope your soul's doubts will be dispelled before we reach the spire. I am not asking you to rise to Nocturne's words, but to my request."

traits.locale_text: “在这种问题上，独角是不会撒谎的！而且，难道你没听到那个垂死的先知说了什么吗？”{n}伊莉耶特绿宝石般的眼中充满了渴切。{/n}“我希望我们到达尖塔之前，你灵魂中的疑虑会消散。我并不是请求你听从那个丑角的话语，而是请求你聆听我的请求。”

languages.text: «¡Ningún Arebennian mentiría sobre esto! ¿O acaso no has oído las palabras del vidente moribundo?». {n}La impaciencia arde en los ojos esmeralda de Yrliet.{/n} «Espero que las dudas de tu alma se desvanezcan antes de que lleguemos a la aguja. No te pido que sigas las palabras de Nocturno, sino las mías».
languages.original_text: "An Arebennian would not lie about this! Or did you not hear the words of the dying Farseer?" {n}Impatience burns in Yrliet's emerald eyes.{/n} "I hope your soul's doubts will be dispelled before we reach the spire. I am not asking you to rise to Nocturne's words, but to my request."

traits.locale_text: «¡Ningún Arebennian mentiría sobre esto! ¿O acaso no has oído las palabras del vidente moribundo?». {n}La impaciencia arde en los ojos esmeralda de Yrliet.{/n} «Espero que las dudas de tu alma se desvanezcan antes de que lleguemos a la aguja. No te pido que sigas las palabras de Nocturno, sino las mías».

languages.text: 「アーベニアンならこんな嘘はつかない！それとも死にゆく先見司の言葉が聞こえなかったのか？」{n}ユリエットのエメラルド色の瞳が苛立ちで燃え上がった。{/n}「我々が尖塔にたどり着く前に、その魂の疑念が払拭されることを願っている。ノクターンの言葉を信じろとは言っていなが、我が願いに耳を傾けてほしい」
languages.original_text: "An Arebennian would not lie about this! Or did you not hear the words of the dying Farseer?" {n}Impatience burns in Yrliet's emerald eyes.{/n} "I hope your soul's doubts will be dispelled before we reach the spire. I am not asking you to rise to Nocturne's words, but to my request."

traits.locale_text: 「アーベニアンならこんな嘘はつかない！それとも死にゆく先見司の言葉が聞こえなかったのか？」{n}ユリエットのエメラルド色の瞳が苛立ちで燃え上がった。{/n}「我々が尖塔にたどり着く前に、その魂の疑念が払拭されることを願っている。ノクターンの言葉を信じろとは言っていなが、我が願いに耳を傾けてほしい」

languages.text: "Ein Arebennian würde in diesem Punkt niemals lügen! Oder habt Ihr die Worte des sterbenden Runenpropheten nicht gehört?" {n}Ungeduld brennt in Yrliets smaragdgrünen Augen.{/n} "Ich hoffe, die Zweifel Eurer Seele werden zerstreut, ehe wir den Turm erreichen. Ich bitte Euch nicht, auf Nocturnes Worte hin zu reagieren, sondern auf meine Aufforderung hin."
languages.original_text: "An Arebennian would not lie about this! Or did you not hear the words of the dying Farseer?" {n}Impatience burns in Yrliet's emerald eyes.{/n} "I hope your soul's doubts will be dispelled before we reach the spire. I am not asking you to rise to Nocturne's words, but to my request."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Arebennian würde in diesem Punkt niemals lügen! Oder habt Ihr die Worte des sterbenden Runenpropheten nicht gehört?" {n}Ungeduld brennt in Yrliets smaragdgrünen Augen.{/n} "Ich hoffe, die Zweifel Eurer Seele werden zerstreut, ehe wir den Turm erreichen. Ich bitte Euch nicht, auf Nocturnes Worte hin zu reagieren, sondern auf meine Aufforderung hin."

languages.text: « Un Arebennian ne mentirait pas sur un sujet pareil ! N'avez-vous donc pas prêté attention aux derniers mots du Grand Prophète ? {n}demande Yrliet, dont les yeux émeraude brûlent d'impatience.{/n} J'espère que les doutes qui emplissent votre âme se dissiperont avant que nous atteignions la tour. Je ne vous demande pas de répondre aux paroles de Nocturne, mais à ma demande. »
languages.original_text: "An Arebennian would not lie about this! Or did you not hear the words of the dying Farseer?" {n}Impatience burns in Yrliet's emerald eyes.{/n} "I hope your soul's doubts will be dispelled before we reach the spire. I am not asking you to rise to Nocturne's words, but to my request."

traits.locale_text: « Un arebennian ne mentirait pas sur un sujet pareil ! N'avez-vous donc pas prêté attention aux derniers mots du Grand Prophète ? {n}demande Yrliet, dont les yeux émeraude brûlent d'impatience.{/n} J'espère que les doutes qui emplissent votre âme se dissiperont avant que nous atteignions la tour. Je ne vous demande pas de répondre aux paroles de Nocturne, mais à ma demande. »

languages.text: "Bir Arebennian, bu konuda yalan söylemez! Yoksa can çekişen Ötesezen'in dediklerini duymadın mı?" {n}Yrliet'in sabırsızlığı, zümrüt yeşili gözlerinden okunuyor.{/n} "Umarım biz kuleye varmadan ruhundaki şüpheler kaybolur. Noktürn'ün sözlerini değil, benim ricamı kabul etmeni istiyorum."
languages.original_text: "An Arebennian would not lie about this! Or did you not hear the words of the dying Farseer?" {n}Impatience burns in Yrliet's emerald eyes.{/n} "I hope your soul's doubts will be dispelled before we reach the spire. I am not asking you to rise to Nocturne's words, but to my request."

traits.locale_text: "Bir Arebennian bu konuda yalan söylemez! Yoksa can çekişen Ötesezenin dediklerini duymadın mı?" {n}Yrliet'in sabırsızlığı, zümrüt yeşili gözlerinden okunuyor.{/n} "Umarım biz kuleye varmadan ruhundaki şüpheler kaybolur. Noktürn'ün sözlerini değil, benim ricamı kabul etmeni istiyorum."
